description: The Tax Calculation service plugin (formerly SPI) allows you to integrate a custom tax calculation service with Wix.

Use the Tax Calculation service plugin together with the [Tax Groups API](https://dev.wix.com/docs/velo/api-reference/wix-billing-v2/tax-groups) and the [Tax Regions API](https://dev.wix.com/docs/velo/api-reference/wix-billing-v2/tax-regions) to customize your tax calculations.
Learn more:
+ [Velo: Custom App Extensions Using service plugins](https://support.wix.com/en/article/velo-custom-business-app-extensions-using-spis-beta)
### To add a service plugin

1. [Add the plugin to your site](https://dev.wix.com/docs/develop-websites/articles/coding-with-velo/integrations/custom-extensions-spis/custom-app-extensions-using-sp-is#step-1-create-a-new-extension-on-your-wix-site).

2. Update the [`getConfig()`](https://dev.wix.com/docs/velo/api-reference/wix-billing-v2/service-plugins-spis/billing-tax-calculation/get-config) function in the **-config.js** file that is added to your site during step 1.

3. Update the [`calculateTax()`](https://dev.wix.com/docs/velo/api-reference/wix-billing-v2/service-plugins-spis/billing-tax-calculation/calculate-tax) function in the **.js** file that is added to your site during step 1.
### Terminology

+ **Tax Group:** A category of products that share the same tax treatment. Tax is calculated based on the tax group and the tax region associated with a line item. See the [Tax Groups API](https://dev.wix.com/docs/velo/api-reference/wix-billing-v2/tax-groups).

+ **Tax Region:** A location, defined by `country` and `subdivision` with a specific tax treatment. Tax is calculated based on the tax region and the tax group associated with a line item. See the [Tax Regions API](https://dev.wix.com/docs/velo/api-reference/wix-billing-v2/tax-regions).

+ **Tax Calculator:** An app that is used under the hood to calculate tax for a Wix site. The app calculates tax based on the tax group of the product and the tax region of the sale. Use the Tax Calculation service plugin to become a tax calculator.

params.name: options
params.doc: Order information to calculate tax for.

docs.summary: Calculates tax for the provided line items.
description: Tax is calculated for each line item based on the [tax region](https://dev.wix.com/docs/velo/api-reference/wix-billing-v2/tax-regions)
in `lineItems.taxRegionId` and the [tax group](https://dev.wix.com/docs/velo/api-reference/wix-billing-v2/tax-groups) in `lineItems.taxGroupId`.
The breakdown of calculated tax returned, includes:
+ `taxSummary`: The overall total tax calculated.
+ `lineItemTaxDetails.taxBreakdown`: The tax calculated for each line item in each jurisdiction.
+ `lineItemTaxDetails.taxSummary`: The total tax calculated for each line item.
### Where to find `calculateTax()`

When you [add the Tax Calculation service plugin](https://dev.wix.com/docs/develop-websites/articles/coding-with-velo/integrations/custom-extensions-spis/custom-app-extensions-using-sp-is#step-1-create-a-new-extension-on-your-wix-site),
a folder is automatically added to your site. Use the `<my-plugin-name>.js` file in the folder to write the code to determine how to calculate tax for an order.

docs.summary: Retrieves the configuration of your tax calculation plugin.
description: Set your tax calculation configuration in the `return` of the `getConfig()` function. Wix calls this function when you publish your site.
Changes to the configuration don't take effect until you publish your site.
### Where to find `getConfig()`

When you [add the Tax Calculation service plugin](https://dev.wix.com/docs/develop-websites/articles/coding-with-velo/integrations/custom-extensions-spis/custom-app-extensions-using-sp-is#step-1-create-a-new-extension-on-your-wix-site),
a folder is automatically added to your site. Use the `<my-plugin-name>-config.js` file in the folder to set the default configuration for your
implementation of the service plugin.

examples.title: Example of a configuration file
body: // Place this code in the <my-plugin-name>-config.js file
// Service Plugins section on your site.

members.name: addressLine
members.doc: Main address line (usually street name and number).

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains apt, suite, floor.

members.name: city
members.doc: City name.

members.name: country
members.doc: Two-letter country code in [ISO-3166 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search/code/) format.

members.name: postalCode
members.doc: Postal or zip code.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Code for a subdivision (such as state, prefecture, or province) in [ISO 3166-2](https://www.iso.org/standard/72483.html) format.

members.name: currency
members.doc: [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) 3-letter currency code representing the currency used in the request sent from Wix. The response is expected to be returned in the same currency.

members.name: identity
members.doc: An object that describes the identity that triggered this request

members.name: languages
members.doc: An array of strings with language information about the request. Generally this array will contain only one string representing the language in which the request is sent from Wix. The response is expected to be returned in the same language in concatenated [ISO 639-1: 2 Alpha language-code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639_language_codes) and [ISO 3166-1: 2 Alpha country-code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1) format, such as "en-US".

members.name: requestId
members.doc: A unique identifier of the request. You may print this ID to your logs to help with future debugging and easier correlation with Wix's logs.

members.name: identityType
members.doc:
Type of identity that triggered the request. Possible values are:
+ `UNKNOWN`
+ `ANONYMOUS_VISITOR`
+ `MEMBER`
+ `WIX_USER`
+ `APP`

members.name: anonymousVisitorId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has not logged in to the site. Only provided if `identityType` is `ANONYMOUS_VISITOR`.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has logged in to the site. Only provided if `identityType` is `MEMBER`.

members.name: wixUserId
members.doc: ID of a Wix user (site owner, contributor, etc.). Only provided if `identityType` is `WIX_USER`.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of an app. Only provided if `identityType` is `APP`.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Line item ID.

members.name: itemName
members.doc: Line item name to display.

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Line item quantity.

members.name: itemCode
members.doc: Stock keeping unit for this line item. Learn more about [SKUs](https://www.wix.com/encyclopedia/definition/stock-keeping-unit-sku).

members.name: taxGroupId
members.doc: Tax group ID for this line item. If not provided, the default tax group applies.

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Whether tax is included in the price.

members.name: price
members.doc: Line item price.

members.name: taxRegionId
members.doc: Tax region ID for this line item.

members.name: addressIndex
members.doc: Index of the address from `addresses` to use to calculate tax for this specific line item. The index is zero-based.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Line item ID.

members.name: itemName
members.doc: Total amount of tax calculated for all line items. Note that due to rounding, `totalTax` may not equal the sum of `lineItemTaxDetails.taxSummary.taxAmount`.

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Line item quantity.

members.name: taxBreakdown
members.doc: Array of each tax applied, grouped by `jurisdiction`, `jurisdictionType`, `taxName`, `taxRate`, and `taxType`.

members.name: taxSummary
members.doc: Summary of this line item's total price and tax.

docs.summary: Summary of this line item's total price and tax.

members.name: fullPrice
members.doc: Total price for this line item. To determine the price for each individual unit of this line item, divide by `quantity`.

members.name: taxAmount
members.doc: The total amount of tax calculated for this line item.

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: Total taxable amount for this line item.

members.name: origin
members.doc: Index of the origin address.

members.name: destination
members.doc: Index of the destination address.

members.name: currency
members.doc: 3-letter currency code in [ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#active_codes) format.

members.name: addresses
members.doc: Array of addresses. Each line item can individually reference the address to apply with `lineItems.addressIndex`.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: Line items to calculate tax for.

members.name: jurisdiction
members.doc: Jurisdiction that taxes were calculated for.

members.name: jurisdictionType
members.doc:
Type of jurisdiction that taxes were calculated for. For example, `"State"`, `"Ã‡ounty"`, `"City"`, `"Special"`, etc.  
Supported values: `"CITY"`, `"COUNTRY"`, `"COUNTY"`, `"SPECIAL"`, `"STATE"`, `"UNDEFINED"`

members.name: nonTaxableAmount
members.doc: Non-taxable amount of the price.

members.name: rate
members.doc: Tax rate used for this jurisdiction, as a decimal. For example, 10% tax is `"0.1000"` and 200% tax is `"2.0000"`.

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: Taxable amount of the price.

members.name: taxAmount
members.doc: Amount of this tax calculated for this jurisdiction.

members.name: taxName
members.doc: Name of the tax that was calculated. For example, `"NY State Sales Tax"`, `"Quebec GST"`, etc.

members.name: taxType
members.doc: Type of tax that was calculated. For example, `"Sales Tax"`, `"Income Tax"`, `"Value Added Tax"`, etc.

members.name: calculatorDisplayName
members.doc: Display name of the tax calculator.

members.name: unsupportedCountries
members.doc: List of countries, in [ISO-3166 alpha-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#officially_assigned_code_elements) format, that the calculator does not support.

members.name: currency
members.doc: 3-letter currency code in [ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#active_codes) format. If this code doesn't match the `currency` passed in the request, then the response is invalid.

members.name: taxSummary
members.doc: Summary of the tax calculated.

members.name: lineItemTaxDetails
members.doc: Details of each tax applied to each line item.

members.name: totalAmount
members.doc: Total price for all line items.

members.name: totalTax
members.doc: Total amount of tax calculated for all line items. Note that due to rounding, `totalTax` may not equal the sum of `lineItemTaxDetails.taxSummary.taxAmount`.

members.name: totalTaxableAmount
members.doc: Total taxable amount for all line items.

members.name: totalTaxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Total amount of `totalTax` that is included in price. Applies to line items with `taxIncludedInPrice` set to `true`.

docs.summary: Index of the address from `addresses` to use to calculate tax for this specific line item. The index is zero-based.

members.name: singleAddress
members.doc: Single address to use for a sale location when only one address is required for tax calculations. The index is zero-based.

members.name: multipleAddresses
members.doc: Multiple addresses to use for a sale. For example, some tax calculations may require both the address where an item is shipped from, as well as the address the item is shipped to.
